DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluates the feasibility of using a 4 week stimulation protocol with the deep TMS H-coils for the treatment of negative symptoms and cognitive deficit in schizophrenia patients
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the H1-coil Deep TMS in the Treatment of Negative Symptoms and Cognitive Deficit in Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: DSM IV Diagnosis of Schizophrenia PANNS Negative > 21 risk factors for convulsions PANNS positive > 24
